description: Apply registration from FEAT analysis to other images

feat_directory.title: FEAT Directory
feat_directory.description: FEAT directory from which registration will be taken

force_flag.title: Force Flag
force_flag.description: Force featregapply to run even if it has already been run on this FEAT directory

cleanup_flag.title: Cleanup Flag
cleanup_flag.description: Cleanup, i.e. remove all featregapply output

upsample_trilinear.title: Upsample Functional-Space Image (Trilinear)
upsample_trilinear.description: Upsample functional-space image to standard space using trilinear interpolation

upsample_spline.title: Upsample Functional-Space Image (Spline)
upsample_spline.description: Upsample functional-space image to standard space using spline (like sinc) interpolation

standard_space_res.title: Standard Space Resolution
standard_space_res.description: Specify the standard space resolution for melodic (e.g. 3 for 3mm)

exclude_filtered_func_flag.title: Exclude Filtered Func Flag
exclude_filtered_func_flag.description: Exclude filtered func when processing melodic directories (for FEAT directories filtered func is never processed)
